name: Mio Amore Di Mafia (Capo Miyo fan game)
name_original: Mio Amore Di Mafia (Capo Miyo fan game)
description:
A RPG MAKER Visual novel fan game of my favorite Italian redheaded Vtuber Capo Miyo, made with lots of love.

Made in 40 hours in the span of a week, is far from perfect and kinda just silly but I hope people can enjoy this project.

NOTE: All endings (4) are necessary to understand the plot.
